REMOVEXP_HELP_DESCRIPTION: Remove a specific amount of exp from a user.
REMOVEXP_HELP_USAGE: Remove a specific amount of exp from a user.```/removexp <user> <exp>```
REMOVEXP_USER_NOT_PREMIUM: This feature is only available for donator. Find out more information using `donate`
REMOVEXP_INPUT_TOO_HIGH: Only exp between 1-20,000 can be removed at once. Please change exp amount.
REMOVEXP_USER_NOT_FOUND: Unable to find the mentioned user, please make sure user provided is in the guild.
